entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
